name: Explorion
description:
Hi! This is my first game so please don't start bashing me. It's very unfinished and is my little project that I work on on my free time, learning about Unity engine and C# at the same time. Explorion is a game where you.. explore! At the moment you can explore my beautiful world and move logs that are inside one of the two huts.

Credits to Jimmy Vegas for awesome textures! Go check him out!
